item.description:
We have over 40 signed up, with a few more spots available, with less than a week to go. Sign up here very soon!

Come celebrate the holidays with your fellow Humanist friends in Worcester!  

We will be gathering at Maxwell Silverman's - it's a great place with good food and lots of holiday ambiance!  There's a lunch buffet with a choice of 3 entrees as well as sides and a desert, and the bar will be open if you're so inclined!

Tables will be set up to sit with friends, and of course you can make the rounds and mingle with others.  There will be lots of happy faces and holiday festivities - come on, we Humanists know how to party!

Feel free to bring along non-members, friends, visiting family - you know they'll feel welcomed by the GWH community, and we're happy to have them along.

We will have a raffle with many cool items donated by members, including a new Kindle, as well as on-topic books and artwork.  We hope you'll take part and help us raise funds for the chapter!

If you'd like to play an instrument or have a local band who would be willing to come out, please let us know - we'd love a live act!  

We'd like to get your RSVP in by November 30th, so please sign up as soon as you can!  You can sign up here, or let a Steering Committee member know you plan to attend.  You will have the option of paying at the door.

We hope to see you there!
item.name: Annual Non-Denominational Festive Winter Bash
